member.name: T:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design.OperationException
member.summary: Represents an exception whose stack trace should, by default, not be reported by the commands.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.DuplicateMigrationName(System.Object)
member.summary: The name '{migrationName}' is used by an existing migration.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.MultipleContexts
member.summary: More than one DbContext was found. Specify which one to use. Use the '-Context' parameter for PowerShell commands and the '--context' parameter for dotnet commands.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.MultipleContextsWithName(System.Object)
member.summary: More than one DbContext named '{name}' was found. Specify which one to use by providing its fully qualified name.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.MultipleContextsWithQualifiedName(System.Object)
member.summary: More than one DbContext named '{name}' was found. Specify which one to use by providing its fully qualified name using its exact case.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.NoContext
member.summary: No DbContext was found. Ensure that you're using the correct assembly and that the type is neither abstract nor generic.

member.summary: No DbContext named '{name}' was found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.LogUseContext(System.Object)
member.summary: Using context '{name}'.

member.summary: A manual migration deletion was detected.

member.summary: No file named '{file}' was found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.NoSnapshotFile(System.Object,System.Object)

member.summary: Reverting model snapshot.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.UnapplyMigration(System.Object)
member.summary: The migration '{name}' has already been applied to the database. Unapply it and try again. If the migration has been applied to other databases, consider reverting its changes using a new migration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.UnknownOperation(System.Object)
member.summary: The current CSharpMigrationOperationGenerator cannot scaffold operations of type '{operationType}'. Configure your services to use one that can.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.UnknownLiteral(System.Object)
member.summary: The current CSharpHelper cannot scaffold literals of type '{literalType}'. Configure your services to use one that can.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.CannotFindRuntimeProviderAssembly(System.Object)
member.summary: Unable to find provider assembly with name {assemblyName}. Ensure the specified name is correct and is referenced by the project.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.DestructiveOperation
member.summary: An operation was scaffolded that may result in the loss of data. Please review the migration for accuracy.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.ReusingDirectory(System.Object)
member.summary: Reusing directory of file '{file}'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.Done

member.summary: Reusing namespace of type '{type}'.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.ReusingSnapshotName(System.Object)
member.summary: Reusing model snapshot name '{name}'.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.CannotFindDesignTimeProviderAssembly(System.Object)
member.summary: Unable to find design-time provider assembly. Please install the {designTimeProviderAssemblyName} NuGet package and ensure that the package is referenced by the project.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.CannotFindDesignTimeProviderAssemblyAttribute(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Unable to find expected assembly attribute named {attributeName} in provider assembly {runtimeProviderAssemblyName}. This attribute is required to identify the class which acts as the design-time service provider factory.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.NonRelationalProvider(System.Object)
member.summary: {provider} is not a Relational provider and therefore cannot be use with Migrations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.UnreferencedAssembly(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Could not load assembly '{assembly}'. Ensure it is referenced by the startup project '{startupProject}'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.LogFindingContexts
member.summary: Finding DbContext classes...

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.ForeignMigrations(System.Object)
member.summary: The namespace '{migrationsNamespace}' contains migrations for a different DbContext. This can result in conflicting migration names. It's reccommend to put migrations for different DbContext classes into different namespaces.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.ConnectionStringRequired
member.summary: ConnectionString is required to generate code.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.ContextClassNotValidCSharpIdentifier(System.Object)
member.summary: The context class name passed in, {contextClassName}, is not a valid C# identifier.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.ProjectPathRequired
member.summary: ProjectPath is required to generate code.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.RootNamespaceRequired
member.summary: Root namespace of the project is required to generate code.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.MigrationsAssemblyMismatch(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Your target project '{assembly}' doesn't match your migrations assembly '{migrationsAssembly}'. Either change your target project or change your migrations assembly. Change your migrations assembly by using DbContextOptionsBuilder. E.g. options.UseSqlServer(connection, b => b.MigrationsAssembly("{assembly}")). By default, the migrations assembly is the assembly containing the DbContext. Change your target project to the migrations project by using the Package Manager Console's Default project drop-down list, or by executing "dotnet ef" from the directory containing the migrations project.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.SensitiveInformationWarning
member.summary: To protect potentially sensitive information in your connection string, you should move it out of source code. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=723263 for guidance on storing connection strings.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.ForceRemoveMigration(System.Object)
member.summary: Removing migration '{name}' without checking the database. If this migration has been applied to the database, you will need to manually reverse the changes it made.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ToolsCoreStrings.NoParameterlessConstructor(System.Object)
member.summary: No parameterless constructor was found on '{contextType}'. Either add a parameterless constructor to '{contextType}' or add an implementation of 'IDbContextFactory<{contextType}>' in the same assembly as '{contextType}'.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Scaffolding.Internal.CodeWriter.GetExistingFilePaths(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType})
member.summary: Returns a list of the files which would be output by this class where the file already exists.
member.param: directory where the files are to be output
a list of the classes to be output
member.returns: A list of paths to the output files which already exist

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Scaffolding.Internal.CodeWriter.GetReadOnlyFilePaths(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType})
member.summary: Returns a list of the files which would be output by this class but which currently exist and would not be able to be overwritten due to being read-only.
member.param: directory where the files are to be output
a list of the classes to be output
member.returns: A list of paths to the output files which currently exist and are read-only

member.name: T:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Scaffolding.Internal.IFileService
member.summary: Abstraction for outputting a 'file'. Normally this will be outputting a file to disk but this allows for other implementations which e.g. just output to memory.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Scaffolding.Internal.IFileService.IsFileReadOnly(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether 'file' is read-only. Absence of the 'file' is interpreted as readable.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Scaffolding.Internal.IFileService.OutputFile(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates, if necessary, a directory with the specified name. Creates, if necessary, a 'file' located within the given directory and with the given name. Ensures that the contents of the 'file' contain the given contents (overwriting if necessary).
member.returns: the full path of the output 'file'

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Scaffolding.Internal.ReverseEngineeringGenerator.ConstructNamespaceAndCanonicalizedPaths(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Construct canonicalized paths from the project path and output path and a namespace based om the root namespace for the project.
member.param: the root namespace for the project, must not be empty
path to the project, must not be empty, can be absolute or relative
path to output directory, can be null or empty, can be absolute or relative (to the project path)
member.returns: an object containing the canonicalized paths and the namespace
